effect.effect_desc: Physical DMG increases by 15% when combo is greater than 50.
Extra DMG Bonus of Red Orb skills increases by 15%.
Basic Attack's Extra DMG Bonus increases by 10%.
Physical DMG increased by 15% if you attack the same target for 5s.
Physical DMG increased by 10% for 3s when switching targets.
The first Basic Attack hit on target is guaranteed to be a Critical Hit. 15s cooldown against the same target.
Basic Attack's Extra DMG Bonus increases by 10%.
Movement Speed is increased by 30% and ATK is increased by 10% for 3s after a 3-Ping. Duration resets every time it is triggered.
Extra DMG Bonus increases by 7% when attacking enemies with Super Armor.
Basic Attack's Extra DMG Bonus increases by 10%.
Basic Attack's Extra DMG Bonus increases by 10%.
After an Entrance Skill Extra DMG Bonus increases by 5% for 8s.
Physical DMG increases by 10% for 5s upon entering Matrix.
Impending Pain's Extra DMG Bonus increases by 10%.
Extra DMG Bonus of Frost Spin increases by 10%.
Attack increases by 8%. After dodging an Attack, movement speed increases by 8% for 4s.
Extra DMG Bonus of Glacial Slash increases by 15%.
Temporary Core: Whenever No. 21: XXI performs Shadow Prism attacks, the Co-Bot unleashes a Force Wave that deals 50% AOE Dark DMG to enemies (only triggers once per second).
DMG from Red Orbs Reaper Sweep increases by 10%.
Basic Attack's Extra DMG Bonus increases by 10%.
Extra DMG Bonus of pings increases by 10%.
Red Orbs deals 15% more damage.
DMG Bonus increases by 10% upon the activation of Dragon Axe.
Fire DMG increases by 5%. 'Perfect!' deals 10% more damage.
Extra DMG Bonus of Radiant Whirlwind increases by 10%.
DMG Bonus of Basic Attack increases by 15%.
Increases CRIT DMG by 10%.
ATK increases by 5%.
Fire DMG increases by 5%.
ATK increases by 5%.
ATK increases by 5%.

ATK increases by 5%.
ATK increases by 5%.
Pinging all 3 types of Signal Orbs within 5s increases Extra DMG Bonus by 15% for 5s. Duration resets every time it is triggered.
Attack have a 20% chance to call down a lightning strike that deals 50% Physical DMG. 3s cooldown.
Gains 1 random Signal Orb every 30 combos. 8s cooldown.
CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG increased by 10% if there are no enemies within 2m.
Attacks have a 30% chance to inflict Broken Armor, reducing an enemy0s DEF by 5% for 3s. Can be stacked up to 5 times. Duration resets every time it is triggered.
Attacks have a 10% chance to unleash a schockwave, dealing 100% Physical DMG to enemies in the area.
3-Ping skills create a Christmas aura that increases the Movement Speed and ATK by 8% for 15s. 30s cooldown.
ATK increases by 12% for 4s after a 3-Ping. Duration resets every time it is triggered.
When Artillery Tactics or Thermal Armament is active, dealing damage causes a firecracker explosion at the target location, inflicting a total of 250% Physical DMG. 10s cooldown.
Extra DMG Bonus increases by 15% for 5s after performing a 3-Ping consecutively. Duration resets every time it is triggered.
Dealing DMG has a 20% chance to release a Yuanxiao that deals 15% Physical DMG. 1s cooldown.
Extra DMG Bonus increases by 10% for 4s when performing a QTE or 3-Ping skill. Duration resets every time it is triggered.
After a 3-Ping, Extra DMG Bonus is increased by 12% for 4s.
Increases ATK by 10% for 3s after casting small/medium/wide-area eletromagnetic beam. Duration resets every time it is triggered.
After a dodge, Extra DMG Bonus is increased by 8% for 4s.
After casting a Blue Orb skill, Physical DMG increases by 10% for 5s. Duration resets every time it is triggered.
Full DMG increases by 15% for 8s if 3 signal orbs in different colors are pinged in 6s.
Physical DMG in Battle Stance increases by 10%.
Upon deploying POD: Shield, A2 gains a 10% Physical DMG boost. Slide for 1s to increase the boost from POD: Shield by an extra 5%.
DMG for Overclock Indicator increases by 10%.
Ice DMG increases by 10%.
After a 3-Ping, ATK increases by 3% for 5s, stacking up to 5 times. Duration resets every time it is triggered.
All DMG increases by 5% after 3-Ping for 5s.

Experimental Core: Whenever No. 21: XXI performs Shadow Prism attacks or disrupts incoming enemy attacks, the Co-Bot unleashes a Force Wave that deals 50% AOE Dark DMG to enemies. This effect can only be triggered once per second.
Inver-Resonance Unit: Increases the Extra DMG Bonus of No. 21: XXI's Twilight Matrix and Resonance Pulse by 10%.
Lightning DMG increases by 10%.
After casting valid combo twice withing 6s, all damage increases by 10% for 5s. Duration resets every time it is triggered.
Upon making a Prayer, gains 15% Extra DMG Bonus for 10s.
Dark DMG increases by 10%.
Base DMG of Signature - Spirit Blade Dance increases by 20%.
Fire DMG increases by 10%.
Dark DMG increases by 10%.
DMG from pinging Signal Orbs increases by 20%.
ATK increases by 5%. CRIT DMG increases by 10%.
Ice DMG increases by 10%.
Fire DMG increases by 10%.
Ice DMG increases by 10%.
Lightning DMG increases by 10%.
Physical DMG increases by 10%.
Lightning DMG increases by 10%.
Lightning DMG increases by 10%.
Dark DMG increases by 10%.

Fire DMG increases by 10%.

Lightning DMG increases by 10%.

Physical DMG increases by 10%.
Dark DMG increases by 10%.
Basic Attack's Extra DMG Bonus increases by 10%. Physical DMG increases by 5% for 2s after each Basic Attack. Can be stacked up to 5 times. Duration resets every time it is triggered.
Laser Shot's Extra DMG Bonus increases by 50%. Gains 15% ATK after a 3-Ping for 5s. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

Attacks have a 20% chance to inflict Breach, dealing 2% Physical DMG per second for 3s. The chance is doubled if the enemy's DEF has been reduced. Can be stacked up to 10 times. Duration resets every time it is triggered. Physical DMG increases by 10% when attacking a Breached enemy.

Lightning DMG Bonus increases by 5% for 4s when dealing Lightning DMG. Can be stacked up to 4 times. Signature Move increases own Extra DMG Bonus by 10% for 10s. Both duration will reset every time it is triggered.

For every 12 orbs pinged, increases Extra DMG Bonus of the allies within 5m by 10% for 5s. Duration resets every time it is triggered. When attacking Imprisoned enemies, Extra DMG Bonus increases by 10%.
Extra DMG Bonus increases by 20% when attacking enemies in a burning area.

Dealing a Critical Hit from behind inflicts Breach, dealing 50% Physical DMG per second for 3s. Duration resets every time it is triggered. Physical DMG increases by 20% when attacking a Breached enemy.

Signature Move's Extra DMG Bonus increases by 15%. Signature Move reduces its target's Physical Resistance by 2% for 5s per hit. Can be stacked up to 8 times. Duration resets every time it is triggered.
Physical DMG increases by 10%. After a 3-Ping, Basic Attack's Extra DMG Bonus is increased by 30% for 5s. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

**This weapon is bad, use Type Zero instead.** Basic Attacks have a 10% chance to inflict Frail, reducing the target's ATK by 10% for 5s. Duration resets every time it is triggered. Attacking a Frail enemy has a 10% chance to restore 1 Signal Orb. 6s cooldown.
Increases Skill - Space Lord's Extra DMG Bonus by 10%. Physical DMG is increased by 15% for 5s after a 3-Ping. Duration resets every time it is triggered.
Fire DMG increases by 10%. Pinging Red Orbs increases Fire DMG by 10% for 5s. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

Attacks have a 10% chance to reduce the target's Fire Resistance by 5% for 5s. 8s cooldown against the same target. A Signature Move increases Fire DMG by 20% and doubles the chance of reducing the target's Resistance.
After a 3-Ping, Physical DMG and Dark DMG dealt increase by 20% for 5s. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

Each Ping increases Physical DMG by 2% for 5s, stacking up to a max of 10 times and repeated trigger refreshes duration. One Sword Orb can be additionally obtained when entering Sword State. 10s cooldown.
Physical DMG increases by 15%. Upon a successful parry, Extra DMG Bonus of the next skill increases by 30%.
Extra DMG Bonus increases by 10%. Dark DMG increases by 10% while under Cosmic Wave state.

Extra DMG Bonus increases by 2% for 5s when dealing DMG to enemies with Super Armor. Can be stacked up to 3 times. Duration resets every time it is triggered. Stuns an enemy for 2s when breaking its Super Armor. 10s cooldown for the same target. Physical DMG increases by 15% for 7s when releasing Vector Cube. Duration resets every time it is triggered.
Lightning DMG is increased by 15%. When dealing Lightning DMG caused by skills to the same target 5 times, calls down a lightning strike that deals 150% Lightning DMG. 2s cooldown.

When picking up an Energy Ball, increases Extra DMG Bonus by 3% for 5s. Can be stacked up to 5 times. For every 5 Energy Balls picked up, gains an additional random Signal Orb and 10 Energy. 10s cooldown.
Lightning DMG increases by 10%. During Signature Move, the number of Lightning Strikes needed to activate Core Passive is reduced to 3.
Ice DMG increases by 15%. DMG increases by 10% for 5s after 3-Ping.
Dark DMG increases by 15%. Attacks have a 15% chance to unleash a shadow wave, dealing 75% Dark DMG. 0.5s cooldown.
Extra DMG Bonus increases by 15%. When Camu: Crocotta enters Berserk, Thanatos will continuously increase Dark DMG for characters on the battlefield by 10%.

Damaging a target will reduce their Physical DEF by 20% for 8s. The duration is refreshed each time this effect is triggered. Dealing damage with small/medium/wide-area electromagnetic beam also applies a damage over time effect for 8s, dealing Physical DMG equal to 25% / 50% / 100% of ATK every second.
Ice DMG increases by 15%. Creates Mirror Crystals for 8s after casting Flowing Whirlpool or QTE skill.

Increases Physical DMG by 20% and Huiyu's attack frequency by 50%. Huiyu gains a new skill: Curse Incarnate. Curse Incarnate: Huiyu becomes a curse attached to the target, dealing up to 420% Physical DMG. It explodes after a short while to deal 480% Physical DMG. The DMG varies based on Qu's Signature Move level.
Dark DMG increases by 15%, and the 4th spine of annihilation orb will produce additional 100% of ranged dark DMG.
Increases Physical DMG by 15% and doubles the effect of Leader Skill. Upon entering combat, gains 160 Stability and switching to Battle Stance gives 2 stacks of Data Correction.

Increases Physical DMG and Healing effects by 15%, also doubles the effects of Leader Skill. After triggering Overclock Indicator, swapping cooldown for 2B and A2 decreases by 1s and they gain 1 random Signal Orb.

Leader Skill effect doubled. A2 is allowed to enter Berserk Mode once POD: Shield increased to 40%. Additionally, A2 will obtain ATK Bonus by 10% under Berserk Mode. In 2s upon entering Matrix and evading, hold Attack button to unleash one enhanced attack to deal 360% Physical DMG. If the enemy was hit, hold the Attack button again to pursue the enemy, dealing a total of 700% Physical DMG (DMG changes with the level of Basic Attack). Charging will consume all Yellow Orbs for charging the lance, and each consumption of a Yellow Orb will deal 100% extra DMG (up to 300%), and provide A2 with POD: Shield of 3% Max. HP. Additionally, consuming any amount of Yellow Orb by Charge Attack will grant A2 with 10% Physical DMG Bonus for 15s.
Ice DMG increases by 15%. Gain Frost Crystal for 8s when the backstep of Blooming Shot successfully dodges an attack.

Lightning DMG increases by 20%. Roaring Thunder and Sonic Vortex can now be cast during the action of other Signal Orb skills, but cannot be cast consecutively. Leaving Chaotic M.I.N.D. will return Orbs based on the number of Orbs before entering Chaotic M.I.N.D. and rearrange them for 3-Ping.
Ice DMG increases by 15%, QTE and any 3-Ping skill can trigger Frost Corrosion (Reduces target's Ice Resistance).

Wide-Energy Pressure Core: Whenever No. 21: XXI performs Shadow Prism attacks, a QTE, or disrupts incoming enemy attacks, the Co-Bot unleashes a Force Wave that deals 50% AOE Dark DMG to enemies (only triggers once per second).

Energy Suppression Unit: Hitting allies with Force Wave will grant them Energy Suppression for 3s. Energy Suppression: Dark DMG reduces the enemy's healing received by 100% for 3s.

Impulse Fort Module: When the Force Wave detonates 6 Twilight Matrices at once, the Co-Bot enters Fortification mode, unleashing a hyper-pulse that deals Dark DMG equal to 400% of No. 21: XXI's ATK (DMG scales with Core Passive level).

Inver-Resonance Unit 2.0: Increases the Extra DMG Bonus of No. 21: XXI's Twilight Matrix and Resonance Pulse by 15%.

Lightning DMG increases by 15%. Victorious War Flag and Signature Move Shining Piercer can create another stack of Electric Charge. When Victorious War Flag is on the field, deploying Vera: Garnet will consume all of Electric Charge to cast Lightning Fall. Create another stack of Electric Charge afterward.

Fire DMG increases by 10%. The cooldown of consecutive dodge is removed. After dodging a damage, accumulates 1 Combo 2 - Dazzling Blade, which can be cast directly toward the direction of the joystick by tapping the White Orb. Also increases Extra DMG Bonus by 10% for 8s. During Apex of Trickery, the Deception Points generated from this combo are converted into 10 Trickery Points instead.
Liv: Empyrea gains 10% more ATK. Every time she enters the battlefield, she gains 50% Prayer. Fire DMG Bonus of Purity Oath against enemies affected by White Oracle increases by 20% (up to 100%).

Each phantom unleashed by Selena: Capriccio on the field will make Selena: Capriccio deal 5% more Extra DMG. This effect can be stacked up to 6 times. Upon casting a Reprise: Echo, Selena: Capriccio gains 12 additional Signature Energy.

Increases Physical DMG dealt by 15% and Base DMG of Signature - Spirit Blade Dance by 25%. CRIT Rate of Spirit Blade: Falling Stars increases by 30% for every Dragon Force Combo cast. (Can be stacked up to 2 times)

Fire DMG increases by 15%. When Nanami: Starfarer is on standby, her teammates' every 3-Ping will restore 12 Signature Energy for her. Missiles will inflict Scorching Invasion upon hitting the target: reduces 15% Fire Resistance for 8s. When Nanami: Starfarer triggers the QTE, if there is Missile Support on the field, the duration of Missile Support will be refreshed.
Bitter Frost deals 20% more Base DMG. Bitterfrost Level's Energy acquisition speed increases by 100%.
The Chain Fusion effect applied by Karenina: Scire increases by 10%. Each time Karenina casts Radiant Whirlwind, she recovers 1 Energy. The Extra DMG Bonus of Leap Attack increases by 20%.
ATK increases by 10%. Triggering Gear-Break Combo or Assault-Rising Combo restores 10 Signature Energy. Dodge Gauge restores 100% faster.
CRIT DMG increases by 30%. Upon entering the Sword Form, immediately gains 20 stacks of Stigmata Will and activate the Resolution status.
ATK increases by 10%. Bambinata: Vitrum's Pas De Chat deals 15% more Ice DMG. Every time Bambinata: Vitrum is deployed, she will forget a random color of Signal Orbs for 1 Pact of Memory.
ATK increases by 10%. Casting Realm Travel will trigger Matrix if it is not on cooldown. The first Hypermatrix Strike launched upon entering battle will generate 1 extra Sight Point.
ATK increases by 10%. Doubles the Base DMG increase effect of Ayla: Kaleido's Vibrant Brushstroke for Signature - Finishing Touch. The Ice DMG Bonus of Frost Crystal increases to 20%.
Increases ATK by 10%. When Lucia: Crimson Weave holds the odachi, her Extra DMG Bonus increases by 15%. The efficiency of acquiring Aphotic Points increases by 40%.

ATK increases by 10%. During the action of pinging any orb, Hanying: Zitherwoe is able to immediately cast another ping for once only. The Base DMG Increase effect of each stack of Emerald Flow increases to 40%.
ATK increases by 10%. Restores 1 set of random 3-Ping Orbs each time No. 21: Feral enters the battle. The Lightning DMG Bonus from Lightning Surge increases to 20%.
ATK increases by 10%. Upon entry or swapping in, Noctis: Indomitus gains 120 Energy. Immediately gains one Blast Orb upon activating Signature - Magnetic Blast.

Increases ATK by 10%. Base DMG of Signature - Celestial Edge increases by 15%. Each time Splendor Points are full, one random Signal Orb and one Cipher Orb of the same color will be generated. Ultralimit Torque now increases Physical DMG by 20%.
ATK increases by 10%. The amount of Abyssal Points earned increases by 100%. Pinging a Tidal Orb will trigger Matrix if it is not in cooldown.
ATK increases by 10%. Base DMG of Flare Strike, Starry Bayonet, Basic Attack - Skycrushing Blade, and Core Passive - Limit Released increases by 100%.
ATK increases by 10%. Upon entering the Assault Mode, gains 3 Red Orbs, up to 6 orbs each time when entering the battlefield. Can quickly cast Scorching Torrent after pinging Red Orbs.

ATK increases by 10%. Upon activating Into the Fray, triggers Matrix if it is not in cooldown and grants a bonus Inscription. When casting Mountain Caller, each attack grants 3 extra Signature Energy.

ATK increases by 10%. Base DMG of Signal Orbs and Stress Orbs increases by 30%. When Teddy: Decryptor enters the battlefield while she is not in Analysis Mode, she will enter Analysis Mode automatically and gain 40 Analysis Points if she has full Signature Energy. Otherwise, she gains 100 Signature Energy.
ATK increases by 10%. After a 3-Ping or casting Shattering Moon with maximum Crescent Points, the next ping is regarded as a 3-Ping. Gains Crescent Points 50% faster.

ATK increases by 10%. Base DMG of Steel Charge increases by 60%. When Red Orbs are depleted, casting Steel Charge or performing a precise block immediately restores 1 Red Orb. The Combustible Charges produced by Prairie Fire increase by 40%.

ATK increases by 10%. The effect of Piercing Blow launched by Hanying: Solacetune increases by 20%. Casting Jade Bloom continuously will stack damage up to 3 times instead. Triggering Ethereal Symphony grants additional 50 Sharp Reserve.
ATK increases by 10%. Doubles the Base DMG of Flurry Blitz, Frosty Barrage, and Snow Storm.
ATK increases by 10%. After performing Signature Move - Auxiliary Precision Slash, recovers 3 Signal Orbs. Entering Blazing Thunder Form will trigger Matrix if it is not on cooldown.

ATK increases by 10%. During Empty Realm and Instructed Realm, Nocturne Rush: Finisher generates an extra 30 Flow gauge. During Enlightened Realm, Base DMG of Nocturne Rush and Reflective Counter increases by 50%.
ATK increases by 10%. Exceed Points' Base DMG boost towards Starfall Collapse doubles. Base DMG of Burning Breakaway doubles.

ATK increases by 10%. Upon casting Signature - Primordial True Form, immediately gain 3 Signal Orbs, up to 6 orbs per entry onto the field. The elemental resistance reduction/damage increase effects triggered by the Observation Chronicle increase by 10%.
ATK increases by 10%. Upon casting Disenchanting Reveal, if Card Rank is at least B, gain 12 Signature Energy.

ATK increases by 10%. After Bladed Resonance is cast with increased Base DMG from Quavers, the next Bladed Cadence will receive the same Base DMG increase. After casting Signature - Rainfall Overture, gains 3 Signal Orbs, up to 6 per entry.
ATK increases by 10%. Every 3 Munitions Orbs consumed restores 1 orb. Extra DMG Bonus of Reflective Chain and Inflow Incendiary increase by 20%.
